text_a: John Smith and Toni met in Seattle.
It was clear to Toni that she had to do what she wanted. Toni said, 'John, I'll get in a car with you, take you to a hotel and we'll go for a drive.
We went for a long drive. It was the first time we'd been to a place that had trees. Tobi said, I want you to be careful with the car and not to touch any things because it will go crazy.
I want you not to do anything that will make me feel uncomfortable. I will help you. We will make our own dinner. We can't eat a lot of food.
